hero.description: Quincy Iheme is a Engineering Leader focused on team-building and advancing careers with more than 8 years of industry experience.

features.heading: Focused on Personal and Professional Improvement

featuresTwo.heading: Relaying Experiences to the Technology Community
featuresTwo.description: Quincy spends time at both internal and external events speaking about his experiences in the technology industry, and how we can all work together for the better.
